## BlockNavigationPolicy.getNextSibling() method

Returns the next peer node of the given block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getNextSibling(current: BlockSvg): IFocusableNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  current | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) | The block to find the following element of. |

**Returns:**

[IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md) \| null

The first block of the next stack if the given block is a terminal block, or its next connection.
